/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with power lines and telephone poles, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. A yellow truck can be seen driving down the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the cityscape. The predominant colors in the image are green, gray, and yellow, reflecting the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
